panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node ordered the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to ordered

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node executes the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to executed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node commits it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to commit

targets.expr: max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_bc_share"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_bc_share"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_add_share"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_add_share"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_agg_decision"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_agg_decision"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_add_first_decision"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_add_first_decision"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

panels.title: Block ordered to add first decision

targets.expr: max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_rcv_ack_decision"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_rcv_ack_decision"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

panels.title: Block orderered to receive acked decision

targets.expr: max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_re_bc_share"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_re_bc_share"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

panels.description: Duration between block ordered time until the moment the node has randomness

targets.expr: max(0, (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_ready"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_ready"}[$interval])) < 1000000) - (quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="rand_enter"}[$interval])) < 1000000))

panels.title: Block ordered to execution ready

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time until the moment the DKGNode is computed.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_node_ready"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_node_ready"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to DKGNode ready

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time and the times when the validator receives others' DKGNodes.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_nodes_received"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_nodes_received"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to receive others' DKGNodes

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time and the times when the validator verifies and aggregates others' DKGNodes.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_nodes_verified_and_aggregated"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_nodes_verified_and_aggregated"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to verify and aggregate others' DKGNodes

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time until the moment the DKGAggNode is ready (aggregated from enough DKGNode).

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_agg_node_ready"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_agg_node_ready"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to DKGAggNode ready

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time until the moment the DKGAggNode is proposed in a block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_agg_node_proposed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_agg_node_proposed"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to DKGAggNode proposed

panels.description: Duration between DKG start time until the moment DKG finishes.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_finish"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_dkg_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="dkg_finish"}[$interval]))

panels.title: DKG start to DKG finish

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_qc_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Timeout rounds per sec

panels.description: The total number a single node has timeout locally. When 2f+1 nodes have local timeout for the same round, a timeout round is formed.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Total local timeout

panels.description: The duration of a single round until it generates local timeout.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_round_timeout_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round timeout value

panels.description: The current epoch number the node is in, the number is bumped with reconfiguration event like key rotation, validator set change etc.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Number of validators for the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Number of validators

panels.description: Total voting power of the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} / 100000000

panels.title: Total voting power
